dialogues.text: We've prepared quite a lot of dishes, phew~
What's wrong? Cat got your tongue?
Just now, Bronya told me that "besides the greedy idiotka, there's another childish guest who needs your attention"...
Oh, no! Why did that guy have to show up too?
Although I couldn't figure out who Bronya was referring to, it's always safe to prepare more dishes for our guests!
So, I've slightly expanded the menu, Seele~
I have some things to attend to as well.
Huh, what are you doing today?
In addition to helping someone taste the dishes, I also need to carefully arrange this place so that the "childish guest" won't nitpick later.
Seele, you're so considerate! I'll work hard too!
